TopicTitle: What was your "kick in the face" of the day?

Articles.Content:
I got an egg thrown in the back of my neck today, oh joy.

By a pair out of the "swag-kids",

you know, the kind you hear about but think to yourself "there is no way any one is so idiotic and short-minded."

That was my first encounter with their kind, and I must say, I'm fascinated at their ability to do the basic human actions in order to survive,

what with their brains drowning in alcohol and the most trivial of thoughts.

Sorry, just got to let the steam blow out somehow.

Anyway, what was your worst moment of the day?

Or when ever the last time it was you had such a moment.

When I was playing FTL and I was nearly decimated by a ship, I had almost no hull left, 2 crew left, no oxygen left on the entire ship at all, and every part of the ship destroyed or heavily damaged.

All this was done by ONE SHIP.

I stayed alive by my upgraded medbay, and was able to repair the ship.

I was able to keep the ship going for another 3 sectors somehow.
getting late to work because path to work obstructed by makeshift rollercoaster... no joke.

Well, this one japanese guy caught four baseballs in-flight during a match, all shot by me. Pissed me slightly off, as our team was losing. I didnÃ‚Â´t show those feelings, swallowed them and finally gave him positive credit for his feat. HeÃ‚Â´s quite a nice guy, a colleague of my actually...
I woke up this morning and tripped over my Cat, and then i realized that it was actually my night-lamp. What it was doing on the floor standing upright and perfectly fine i have yet to find out.
I got kicked in the face. I don't know why, I just did
Woke up late and got dumped, Ugh not the best way to kick start a day.

I accidentally deleted the entire Squad folder from GameData.

Had to re-download the entire 0.20.2 version again.... The download lasted two hours. :/
